\/C:\/Users\/admin\/Desktop\/codepool\/_: The article talks about how to create a cross-platform barcode reader with the B4X rapid development tool.
The article talks about how to create a cross-platform barcode reader with the B4X rapid development tool.
<g1>B4X</g1> is a set of rapid development tools which can be used to develop apps for all the major mobile and desktop platforms.
<g1>B4X</g1>是一套快速应用开发（RAD）工具，可用于为主流的移动和桌面平台开发应用。
<g1>B4X</g1> is a set of rapid development tools which can be used to develop apps for all the major mobile and desktop platforms.
B4A, B4i, B4J and B4R, which aim at Android, iOS, Java (desktop with JavaFX, server and Raspberry Pi) and Arduino development.
B4A、B4i、B4J和B4R，分别用于Android、iOS、Java（JavaFX桌面、服务器和树莓派）和Arduino开发。
B4A, B4i, B4J and B4R, which aim at Android, iOS, Java (desktop with JavaFX, server and Raspberry Pi) and Arduino development.
Apart from multi-platform support, it has the following features:
除了多平台支持外，B4X还具有以下特点：
Apart from multi-platform support, it has the following features:
B4X can create native apps for Android and iOS.
B4X can create native apps for Android and iOS.
The B4X programming language is a modern version of Visual Basic.
B4X编程语言是一种Visual Basic的现代版本。
The B4X programming language is a modern version of Visual Basic.
It will be compiled to Java for Android and Objective-C for iOS.
它会被编译成Android的Java和iOS的Objective-C代码。
It will be compiled to Java for Android and Objective-C for iOS.
This feature makes it easy to integrate Java/Objective-C libraries into B4X projects.
因为这个特点，将Java/Objective-C的类库集成到B4X项目中是很容易的事情。
This feature makes it easy to integrate Java/Objective-C libraries into B4X projects.
The code can be shared across platforms, although we still have to write the platform-specific parts like Camera and file picker.
B4X代码可以跨平台共享。不过我们仍然需要编写平台专属的部分代码，比如控制摄像头和选择文件。
The code can be shared across platforms, although we still have to write the platform-specific parts like Camera and file picker.
<g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader (DBR)</g1> is a barcode SDK written in C++ and provides JavaScript, Java and Objective-C packages.
<g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader (DBR)</g1>是一种用C++编写的条码SDK，提供JavaScript、Java和Objective-C的封装。
<g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader (DBR)</g1> is a barcode SDK written in C++ and provides JavaScript, Java and Objective-C packages.
So it is easy to wrap it into a B4X library to develop Android, iOS and desktop barcode reader apps with B4X.
我们可以很容易地将其封装为一个B4X库，便于用B4X开发Android、iOS和桌面端的条码读取软件。
So it is easy to wrap it into a B4X library to develop Android, iOS and desktop barcode reader apps with B4X.
In this article, we are going to create a B4X wrapper and create demo apps for Andoid, iOS and desktop.
在本文中，我们将完成B4X库的封装，并创建Android、iOS和桌面平台上的演示应用。
In this article, we are going to create a B4X wrapper and create demo apps for Andoid, iOS and desktop.
Let's first create a new B4J project to create and test the barcode library.
我们首先建立一个新的B4J项目来创建和测试这个扫码库。
Let's first create a new B4J project to create and test the barcode library.
Create a new B4XPages project with B4J.
在B4J中创建一个新的B4XPages项目。
Create a new B4XPages project with B4J.
Add a button to pick images, a button to decode, a panel to display the image and a label to show the results.
添加一个选择图像按钮，一个解码按钮，一个面板用于显示图像，一个标签用于显示结果。
Add a button to pick images, a button to decode, a panel to display the image and a label to show the results.
After that, we click generate members to declare these controls and add event subs in the code.
之后，我们单击生成成员以在代码中声明这些控件并添加事件子程序。
After that, we click generate members to declare these controls and add event subs in the code.
Draw the image on the Panel with B4XCanvas.
用B4XCanvas在面板上绘制所选图像。
Draw the image on the Panel with B4XCanvas.
Now, we have to implement the decoding part.
现在，我们要实现解码部分。
Now, we have to implement the decoding part.
Download Dynamsoft Barcode Reader's jar file from <g1>its website</g1>.
从<g1>官网</g1>下载Dynamsoft Barcode Reader的jar文件。
Download Dynamsoft Barcode Reader's jar file from <g1>its website</g1>.
Config the path of the folder of additional libraries.
配置额外类库文件夹的路径。
Config the path of the folder of additional libraries.
Put the jar in the additional libraries folder.
将jar放在额外类库文件夹中。
Put the jar in the additional libraries folder.
Reference the jar in <g1>Main</g1> by adding this line of code:
在<g1>Main</g1>中添加以下代码行导入jar：
Reference the jar in <g1>Main</g1> by adding this line of code:
Basically, there are two ways to create a wrapper.
封装库主要有两种方法。
Basically, there are two ways to create a wrapper.
One is directly writing in Java, which is illustrated <g1>here</g1>.
一种是直接用Java编写（<g1>详细说明</g1>）。
One is directly writing in Java, which is illustrated <g1>here</g1>.
Creating an iOS library is a bit harder which uses Objective-C.
使用Objective-C创建iOS库会稍微困难一点。
Creating an iOS library is a bit harder which uses Objective-C.
The other is using <g1>JavaObject</g1> to directly call Java APIs using B4X based on Java's reflection feature.
另一种是使用<g1>JavaObject</g1>，基于Java反射特性直接调用Java API。
The other is using <g1>JavaObject</g1> to directly call Java APIs using B4X based on Java's reflection feature.
<g2>NativeObject</g2> is the equivalence of JavaObject in B4i.
<g2>NativeObject</g2> is the equivalence of JavaObject in B4i.
It can be used with the <g1>inline java code</g1> feature.
它可以与<g1>内联Java代码</g1>一起使用。
It can be used with the <g1>inline java code</g1> feature.
Java code can be directly included in B4X's source code, as shown below.
Java代码可以直接包含在B4X的源代码中，如下所示。
Java code can be directly included in B4X's source code, as shown below.
Then it can be called using JavaObject.
Then it can be called using JavaObject.
Here, we choose JavaObject to create the wrapper.
这里，我们选择使用JavaObject来进行封装。
Here, we choose JavaObject to create the wrapper.
Create a class and name it DBR.
创建一个类并将其命名为DBR。
Create a class and name it DBR.
A TextResult class is created to represent the decoding result.
创建一个TextResult类来表示解码结果。
A TextResult class is created to represent the decoding result.
Here we just parse the text and localization result.
这里我们只解析文本和定位结果。
Here we just parse the text and localization result.
Now, we can implement the decoding part with the wrapper.
现在，我们可以用做好的封装来实现解码部分。
Now, we can implement the decoding part with the wrapper.
初始化一个DBR的实例，命名为reader。
Decode the image and display the result.
Decode the image and display the result.

We have finished the B4J application.
我们已经完成了应用的B4J版本。
We have finished the B4J application.
Now, let's modify it to make it work on Android and iOS.
接下来我们稍作修改，使其能够在Android和iOS上工作。
Now, let's modify it to make it work on Android and iOS.
Upon creation of a B4Xpage project, it will create three folders containing the platform-specific files and a <g1>Shared Files</g1> folder for shared asset files.
在建立B4XPages项目时，会创建包含平台特定的文件的三个文件夹和一个共享资产文件的<g1>Shared Files</g1>文件夹。
Upon creation of a B4Xpage project, it will create three folders containing the platform-specific files and a <g1>Shared Files</g1> folder for shared asset files.
Shared class files are stored in the root.
共享的类文件存储在根目录中。
Shared class files are stored in the root.
打开之前建立的项目的文件夹。

我们可以看到这样的文件夹结构：

现在我们想让我们刚建立的文件在三个平台的项目中共享。
Now we want to share the files we just created in the three platforms' projects.
Move the <g1>DBR.bas</g1> and <g2>TextResult.bas</g2> to the root.
Move the <g1>DBR.bas</g1> and <g2>TextResult.bas</g2> to the root.
Open the B4A, B4J and B4i projects and re-add them as new modules using relative path.
打开B4A、B4J和B4i项目，使用相对路径导入这两个文件。
Open the B4A, B4J and B4i projects and re-add them as new modules using relative path.
Select and copy all the controls.
Select and copy all the controls.
Open the layout files for B4i and B4A with their designer and paste.
用设计器打开B4i和B4A的布局文件并粘贴。
Open the layout files for B4i and B4A with their designer and paste.

特定于平台的代码可以使用#if语句存在于一个源文件中。
Platform-specific code can exist in one source file using the #if statement.

It is easy to use B4X to create a cross-platform barcode reader.
使用B4X可以很容易地创建跨平台条码阅读器。
It is easy to use B4X to create a cross-platform barcode reader.
The code and UI can be shared across platforms though we still need to know a bit about native development.
代码和UI可以跨平台共享。不过我们还是需要了解一些原生开发。
